intro.title: Climate & Energy Governance Framework
intro.paragraph1: The Climate & Energy Governance Framework provides a comprehensive governance architecture to limit warming to 1.5¬∞C, accelerate clean energy transition, and build climate resilience for vulnerable communities.
intro.paragraph2: This framework integrates four pillars‚Äîmitigation, adaptation, energy transition, and innovation‚Äîwith a multi-level governance structure and principles that promote ecological balance, equity, and science-based decision making.
